ComicInfo.Summary:
No sooner do they regroup from the last epic battle, Maria and her Russian forces face their Japanese foes, with a stunning turn of events!
Available with Regular, Wraparound, War Crimes, Propaganda, Blitzkrieg, and VIP Premium by series artist Daniel Gete.
